data.comment: The big names in today's match at John Smith's Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Geoff Eltringham, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at John Smith's Stadium.
Isaac Mbenza is on a sub for Ben Jackson for Huddersfield.
In the minute 58, At John Smith's Stadium, Kieran Dowell has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team have replaced Adama Diakhaby with Jaden Brown. This is the second substitution made today by Carlos Corberan.
Przemyslaw Placheta is replacing Onel Hernandez for the away team.
In the minute 75, Daniel Farke is making the team's second substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Adam Idah replacing Kieran Dowell.
Norwich's Todd Cantwell has been booked in Huddersfield.
Adam Idah scores to make it 0-1 at John Smith's Stadium.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Richard Stearman with Fraizer Campbell.
Jaden Brown (Huddersfield) has received a first yellow card.
Lukas Rupp is replacing Todd Cantwell for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Adam Idah is booked for the away team.
